title: Screen
body:
<<WAIT>><<0>>
<<IF>><<task task_exists D1T1 end>> 3:25
<<TASK.CHECK>><<D1T1:1>>
<<DESTROY.TRG>><<Screen>>
<<SET>><<Screen4 b= false>>
...
<<BREAK>>
...
<<BREAK>>
...
<<BREAK>>
Nothing of notice.
<<BREAK>>
<<IF>><<task completed D1T1 end>> 15:22
My round is done for tonight.
<<BREAK>>
Home...
<<BREAK>>
<<TASK.CLEAR>><<D1T1>>
<<SET>><<Day_Done b= true>>
<<END>>
The security feed is running regularly. The world is reflected on the screen in muted colours.
<<BREAK>>
Nothing seems to be out of the ordinary.
<<BREAK>>
<<END>>
Onto the next one.
<<BREAK>>
<<END>>

title: Debugger
body:
<<TASK.ADD>><<D1T1:Check the status of the four security stations:4:false>>
<<TASK.CHECK>><<D1T1:3>>
<<END>>

title: Papers
body:
Someone must have left these here...
<<BREAK>>
<<GET>><<PAPERS01>>
<<DESTROY.TRG>><<Papers>>
<<END>>
